messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Watashi wa Bushi
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I ve been here before, I still yet to learn about the Japanese history and not just the samurai. My favorite samurai is Tokugawa Ieyasu, and Tokugawa
messages.messageBody:
Hello, I've been here before, I still yet to learn
about the Japanese history and not just the samurai.
My favorite samurai is Tokugawa Ieyasu, and Tokugawa
Ieyasu became Shogun after the battle of Sekigahara in
1600. I don't know much about what he did before
becoming Shogun, Tokugawa Ieyasu really was a strong
general.
